title: India

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose a target to religiously convert.
- Forcefully convert a target. This bypasses all limits. (Costs 18 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At night, you will have a private chat with your target. You will appear as Gandhi.
- The target can choose whether or not they would like to convert. You will not see their decision until the end of the night.
- If the target accepts, they will have a 1/x chance of successfully converting, where x is the amount of living Civilizations.
- If the target declines, you will deal a Basic attack to them.
- You may choose to go pacifist. This will increase the chance of conversion to 2/x, but you will not attack the target if they decline.
- If you fail to convert a player, you must wait two nights before attempting to convert them again.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were flattened by an Indian war elephant.” (Factional Kill)
“They refused to be converted.” (Killing Decliners)

desc:
Post 2138
*“The essence of all religions is one. Only their approaches are different.” -Mahatma Gandhi*
